column1: Family and friends are cordially invited to attend the visitation from the funeral home on Monday
column3: 2015 from 9:00 to 11:00 AM followed by a funeral mass in St. John the Evangelist Church 320 Winthrop St.
column4: Winthrop at 11:30 AM. Interment to follow the mass in the Winthrop Cemetery (Belle Isle section).
